data.title: Replication datasets â€“ Peace Research Institute Oslo (PRIO)
data.text:
The following list provides access to the datasets used by authors of articles appearing in Journal of Peace Research since 1998. Details on this policy can be found on our Submissions andEnquiries page.

These files are made freely available and no special permission is required to use them. However, as a matter of courtesy and professional acknowledgement, we ask that a bibliographic citation to the original article is included in any paper, article, or book making use of the data.

If you should experience any problems accessing or downloading any of these datasets, please contact us at the following address: jpr@prio.org. For other replication data by PRIO staff, see our data pages.

Responses and comments to articles, if any, are included in the zip-file containing the replication data.
